EmailTemplate.subject: Marriott Hotel Needs You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Calling all school leavers!
Do you want to develop your skills in the largest hotel chain in the world? Looking for an opportunity with a clear route to management?
Marriott Hotel is now hiring for the next generation of hospitality professionals!
Register Your Interest Now
Tell me more.
As a Marriott Apprentice, your first year will be fully supported with training and guidance from Step Forward, a unique school leavers’ programme brought to you by The Challenge. You then have the opportunity to continue with Marriott on an apprenticeship with a difference.
Join us and we’ll support you to reach your full potential. Bring us your passion and determination to succeed and we’ll show you a world of opportunity that reaches every corner of the globe.
Year One
Receive world class training on the job and move into a supervisory role.
Year Two
Possibility to secure full-time employment, earn up to £15,000 and accelerate your career path.
Year Three
Potential to secure a job anywhere in the world in a Marriott Hotel
Yes please, what next?
Take 5 minutes to start your journey today by registering your interest in Step Forward on our website.
www.stepforward.uk.com
You'll then receive an email with more information and full instructions on how to apply.
Our next assessments are happening soon so take the first step to securing your future now.
www.stepforward.uk.com
